title: Solon man sentenced to two years in prison for murder-for-hire plot (United States Attorney's Office ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the Northern District of Ohio ) A Solon man was sentenced to more than two years in prison for his role in murder-for-hire plot, said Steven M. Dettelbach, U.S. Attorney for the Northern District
